field_label: CURRENTLY is your psoriasis:
Over the last week, how itchy, sore, painful or stinging has your skin been?
Over the last week, how embarrassed or self-conscious have you been because of your skin?
Over the last week, how much has your skin interfered with you going shopping or looking after your home or garden?
Over the last week, how much has your skin influenced the clothes you wear?
Over the last week, how much has your skin affected any social or leisure activities?
Over the last week, how much has your skin made it difficult for you to do any sport?
Over the last week, has your skin prevented you from working or studying?
Over the last week how much has your skin been a problem at work or studying?
Over the last week, how much has your skin created problems with your partner or any of your close friends or relatives?
Over the last week, how much has your skin caused any sexual difficulties?
Over the last week, how much of a problem has the treatment for your skin been, for example by making your home messy, or by taking up time?
dlqi_calc
calculation_fn: const sum = (+fupso_dlqi1 > 4 ? 4 : +fupso_dlqi1) +(+fupso_dlqi2 > 4 ? 4 : +fupso_dlqi2) +(+fupso_dlqi3 > 4 ? 4 : +fupso_dlqi3) +(+fupso_dlqi4 > 4 ? 4 : +fupso_dlqi4) +(+fupso_dlqi5 > 4 ? 4 : +fupso_dlqi5) +(+fupso_dlqi6 > 4 ? 4 : +fupso_dlqi6) +(+fupso_dlqi7a ? (+fupso_dlqi7a > 4 ? 4 : +fupso_dlqi7a) : 4) +(+fupso_dlqi8 > 4 ? 4 : +fupso_dlqi8) +(+fupso_dlqi9 > 4 ? 4 : +fupso_dlqi9) +(+fupso_dlqi10 > 4 ? 4 : +fupso_dlqi10);console.log('***** = ', sum);const res = 40 - sum;return res<0 ? 0 : res;

With these next few questions, we are trying to find out about your health and care needs. If you are unsure, please put in your best estimate.

<u>1) Community-based NHS services</u>

In the last 3 months have you had an appointment with any community-based health professionals (e.g., GP, practice nurse, walk-in centre etc) as a result of your psoriasis or treatment for your psoriasis?

For each professional listed below, please state 'Yes' if you had an appointment with that professional as a result of your psoriasis or treatment for your psoriasis, and enter the number of visits (virtual/telephone and in-person visits). There is space for you to name other professionals you have seen via the NHS as a result of your psoriasis or treatment for your psoriasis.
General Practitioner

Community dermatology service

Upload the photograph of your worst affected site by clicking on the green 'upload file' link and select the best photo of your worst affected site from your photo library.

2. Take a photo of your chest and stomach.

  • Switch to the front-facing camera on your smartphone.
  • Hold your smartphone in front of you to take a photo of your chest and stomach. An example of the area to be photographed is shown below.
  • Check the image to ensure it is in focus and your entire chest and stomach are included as per the example below.
  • Once you are happy with the photo you have taken ensure it is saved to your photo library.
Upload the photograph of your worst affected site by clicking on the green 'upload file' link and select the best photo of your worst affected site from your photo library.

3. Take a photograph of both your legs.

  • Hold your smartphone in front of you to take a photo of your legs. An example of the area to be photographed is shown below.
  • Hold your smartphone in front of you to take a photo of your chest and stomach. An example of the area to be photographed is shown below.
  • Check the image to ensure it is in focus and both your legs are included as per the example below.
  • Once you are happy with the photo you have taken ensure it is saved to your photo library.
